entry.def: A place that is equidistant from two other places is the same distance away from each of these places.

example.ex: Horsey is equidistant from Great Yarmouth and Mundesley.
example.tran: 从霍西到大雅茅斯和曼斯利的距离相等。

means.word_mean: 1. the same distance apart at every point
